body:
On Wednesday, September 24, 2003, at 05:40 AM, Weismann Stephan wrote:


Hi Stephan,

Forgive me if this had been answered already I am "disconnected" at the
moment, have not checked my email in several hours and am just sitting
down now to reply to some others, and will not send this till tomorrow,
so the info may be a bit stale by then.  The photon map tool was part
of Roland's PhD, and AFAIK it's sort-of "stalled" right now, he's doing
some validations and the like.  Also, I believe it *is* stable.  You
might also wanna check out Francesco Anselmo's compiled source
packages; you have the option of downloading the Radiance release with
the photon map module, precompiled, in a variety of formats (.rpm,
etc...)  As far as future development, you'll have to talk to Roland...

Rob Guglielmetti
rpg@rumblestrip.org
www.rumblestrip.org
subject: [Radiance-general] Photon Map?
